entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] How-to add dotnet component into existing JavaScript application #80098
    8.0.0
  • ArrayTypeMismatchException in nested arrays with function pointers (android) #80095
    7.0.x
  • Add export for `GetCLRRuntimeHost` to singlefilehost? #80092

Closed

  • Use RID-layout for OS configurations in libraries #32451
    Future
  • Subtraction of -25893.178 from -25893.179 returns value with extra precision #80101
  • [mono][release/7.0] build libs for android arm64 failed on ubuntu #78141
  • Better diagnostics for coreclr initialization failures #70211
    Future
  • Document System.Net.Quic prerequisites and supported OSes #80001
  • [Weird] HTTP/3 does not work after publishing app, but works on debug and release #79727
  • HTTP/3 checker website claims it supports HTTP/3, but HttpClient throws VER_NEG_ERROR #79729
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringEquality #79617
  • Singleton service becomes transient when typed HttpClient is injected #80089

PullRequests

Created

  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #80106
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Remove page map from PAL virtual memory allocator #80105
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable CoreCLR init failure logging in single exe host #80104
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable AOT-ing a few assemblies in the System.Runtime tests t… #80103
  • Clean-up ILLink targets and avoid binplacing #80102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Avoid emitting gshared methods multiple times when prefer… #80100
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ignore SendMessageTimeout failures on Windows Nano Server #80099
    area-System.Runtime
  • Ignore uninstantiated generic method #80096
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add more precise tracking of static bases #80093
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rewrite how Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 are implemented #80091
    area-System.Numerics
  • Generate fewer `ExactMethodInstantiationsHashtable` entries #80090
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Use shipping runtime.json for RID targeting #80074
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • * Registry.GetSubKeyNames : Remove List copy to Array #79345
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Use ArrayBuffer for write buffer management in HttpConnection #79525
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in MultipartContent #79788
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in WebSocketValidate #79974
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Resolve generic virtual methods in managed type system #80035
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT checked leg #79847
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Use QueueUserAPC2 in GC suspension, if available. #80087
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Improve the performance of ConditionalWeakTable.TryGetValue #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Disable struct promotion for structs with SIMD12 fields #79151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 #79997
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • fix TLS resume with client certificates #79898
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
